help.short: Create to create or update a lab schedule.
Delete to delete a schedule resource.
List a list of all schedules for a lab.
Get the properties of a lab Schedule.
Update to update a lab schedule.
Manage Schedule
Create to create or update a lab user.
Delete to delete a user resource.
Operation to invite a user to a lab.
List a list of all users for a lab.
Get the properties of a lab user.
Update to update a lab user.
Manage User
List a list of all virtual machines for a lab.
Action to redeploy a lab virtual machine to a different compute node. For troubleshooting connectivity.
Re-image a lab virtual machine. The virtual machine will be deleted and recreated using the latest published snapshot of the reference environment of the lab.
Resets a lab virtual machine password.
Get the properties for a lab virtual machine.
Action to start a lab virtual machine.
Action to stop a lab virtual machine.
Manage Virtual Machine
Create to create or update a lab resource.
Delete to delete a lab resource.
List a list of all labs for a subscription.
Publish or re-publish a lab. This will create or update all lab resources, such as virtual machines.
Get the properties of a lab resource.
Action used to manually kick off an AAD group sync job.
Update to update a lab resource.
Manage Lab
Create an image resource via PUT. Creating new resources via PUT will not function.
List all images from galleries attached to a lab plan.
Get an image resource.
Update an image resource.
Manage Image
Create to create or update a Lab Plan resource.
Delete to delete a Lab Plan resource. Deleting a lab plan does not delete labs associated with a lab plan, nor does it delete shared images added to a gallery via the lab plan permission container.
List a list of all lab plans within a subscription
Saves an image from a lab VM to the attached shared image gallery.
Get the properties of a Lab Plan.
Update to update a Lab Plan resource.
Manage Lab Plan
Get an azure operation result.
Manage Operation Result
List a list of all the Azure Lab Services resource SKUs.
Manage Skus
List list of usage per SKU family for the specified subscription in the specified region.
Manage Usage
Manage Lab Services
